document.full_text: kia motors will begin making optima midsize sedans at its plant in west point, ga., a move expected to add about 700 jobs.
document.title: kia will add 700 jobs in georgia to make optima midsize sedans
lines_and_colors: kia motors will begin making optima midsize sedans at its plant in west point, ga., a move expected to add about 700 jobs.
